content:
Blue Marlin Abu Dhabi于 2012 年 2 月开业，真正成为该地区的海滩俱乐部的标杆，并迅速成为阿联酋日夜派对最受欢迎的场所之一。

 

这家屡获殊荣的海滩俱乐部因其周五的日夜派对而广受欢迎，它定期邀请世界上最热门的 House 和 Techno DJ，还有悠闲的巴利阿里风格的周六brunch。
contentEn:
Having opened in February 2012, Blue Marlin Ibiza UAE really set the standard for beach clubs in the region, and quickly became one of the most sought-after spots for both day and night parties in the UAE.

 

The award-winning beach club is equally as popular for its day-to-night Friday parties, where it regularly flies in the worlds hottest house and techno DJs, as it is for its laid-back, Balearic-style Saturday brunch.
remarks:

address: Golden Tulip Al Jazira Hotels and Resort,off Sheikh Zayed road، Exit 399,Ghantoot - Abu Dhabi
